Title: Establishes a residential condominium owner's bill of rights
Summary: Enacts a bill of rights for owners of residential condominium units to provide fair and equitable treatment of all unit owners; directs the attorney general to promulgate a handbook summary of the rights of unit owners vis-a-vis condominium associations and the procedures and processes available to unit owners to enforce such rights.
LawCode: Add ยง352-eeeee, Gen Bus L; add ยง708-a, BC L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law and the business corporation law, in relation to enactment of a residential condominium and cooperative owner's bill of rights
